name: Troy J. MAYER, Appellant v. Louis FOLINO, Jeffrey Beard, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees

parties: Troy J. MAYER, Appellant v. Louis FOLINO, Jeffrey Beard, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of August, 2008, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED, Appellant’s Motion for Immediate Appointment of Counsel is DISMISSED AS MOOT.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
955 A.2d 347
Troy J. MAYER, Appellant v. Louis FOLINO, Jeffrey Beard, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 18, 2008.
